# Observable

**Protocol**

A type that emits notifications to observers when underlying data changes.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol Observable
```

## Overview

Conforming to this protocol signals to other APIs that the type supports observation. However, applying the `Observable` protocol by itself to a type doesn’t add observation functionality to the type. Instead, always use the [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Observation/Observable()] macro when adding observation support to a type.

## Observable conformance

- **Observable()**: Defines and implements conformance of the Observable protocol.
